title: Small businesses take on Trump's tariffs at Supreme Court | The Excerpt

title: Pelosi to retire after 38 years in Congress
shortDescription: California Representative and former Speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi will retire after 38 years in Congress.

title: Nancy Pelosi's 'old school' career, from Obamacare to impeachment
shortDescription: Agree with her policies or not, Nancy Pelosi was among the most consequential legislative leaders since legends Lyndon Johnson and Sam Rayburn.

title: Nancy Pelosi will retire after four groundbreaking decades in Congress
shortDescription: The former House speaker, revered by supporters and reviled by foes, had served as the most powerful woman in U.S. history.

title: Trump works to minimize damage from rough 2025 elections: Live updates
shortDescription: President Trump is out to stop the 2025 midterms from turning into a preview of the 2026 midterms. Democrats want to keep the momentum going.

title: Trump oversees 2 longest government shutdowns. What did he say last time?
shortDescription: President Trump has been in office during the two longest shutdowns in American history. How did the 2019 government shutdown end and what caused it?

title: Trump blitz enforcer defends federal agents in Chicago as 'exemplary'
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge Sara L. Ellis heard from Border Patrol officials and Chicagoans impacted by the president’s Midway Blitz crackdown.

title: Trump says choice in 2026 is between 'communism and common sense'
shortDescription: The president rehashed 2024 campaign themes — including musing about transgender weightlifters and resurrecting nicknames for political rivals.

title: What Dem victories may mean for midterms
shortDescription: The GOP suffered losses across the country in off-year contests. Do the results send a message about the Democratic Party? Here's what we know.

title: Trump tariffs face tough questions at Supreme Court: What's next?
shortDescription: Justices question whether Trump has the power to impose tariffs on most imports. The questions reveal much about where they stand on Trump's policies.

title: Virginia and Maryland legislature Democrats at odds over redistricting
shortDescription: Virginia Senate President L. Louise Lucas called out Maryland Senate President Bill Ferguson, who has opposed his state jumping into the national fray

title: Supreme Court to decide fate of Trump's tariffs
shortDescription: The Supreme Court will decide whether President Donald Trump's global tariffs represent an overreach of presidential power.

title: California passed new congressional maps. The scramble for 2026 begins.

title: Democrats ride Trump-era economic anxiety to wave of election wins

title: Trump blames shutdown for election results
shortDescription: President Donald Trump suggested the shutdown was to blame for Republican election losses.

title: Trump-led partisan redistricting battle isn't over in Kansas
shortDescription: While Kansas Republicans failed to call a special session on redistricting, the GOP gerrymandering effort targeting Sharice Davids isn't over.

title: Democrats get mixed messages in 2025 election wins in NJ, VA, NYC
shortDescription: Zohran Mamdani's NYC win, coupled with moderates' victories in New Jersey and Virginia, ignite a Democratic debate over 2026 election strategy.
